ygData.subject: Re: Yellow?!?
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually the blue plate that  you are seeing is not from the plane of fear.  If I am correct it is well crafted plate armor that is made by the a named centaur
ygData.messageBody:
Actually the blue plate that you are seeing is not from the plane of
fear. If I am correct it is well crafted plate armor that is made by the
a named centaur in S. Karana. The armor has extremely high ac, is blue
and is warrior only. I have seen a few pieces already on a few warriors.

Treilanin Loreweaver

On Thu, 29 Jul 1999 RON_TALBOT@... wrote:

> From: RON_TALBOT@...
>
> This explains why I heard someone auctioning blue armor last night.
> That didn't take long to migrate to S Karana!
>
>
> ______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
> Subject: [eqbards] Yellow?!?
> Author: Non-HP-kim (kim@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
> Date: 7/29/99 8:06 AM
>
>
> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> >From EQ'Lizer's main news section:
>
> -------------------------------------------------------------
> July 29th--
>
> I talked to Vlad of Avatars of Doom on Karana awhile back. He
> said should like J.C. said, they've made the planes extremly
> hard now. Creatures backstabbing for 400 damage when you try to
> portal in. Getting hit can teleport you to other parts of the
> zone. He did mention before they made it impossible to get it
> about some of the armor. Hopefully he'll send it on in as well
> as the rest of his guildmates. Paladin armor is blue. Cleric
> armor is purple. Bard armor is yellow. Druid is green
> ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
> chain. Ranger is green plate. Shaman is grey (not sure).
> -------------------------------------------------------------
>
> Yellow? Why yellow? I feel a barrage of coward jokes and
> have-a-nice-day jokes coming...
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
